notes: Add: Add missing i18n in some UI components
Fix: Fix not able to provide image when feedback to the model
Feat: Now the default prompt will use "Step Agent Prompt" instead of "You are a helpful assistant"
Add: Add diagnostics error detection for the code written by language model
Fix: More replacement for the Gemini response string that will break the code when write to file, (e.g. `\r`, `\n`, `\t`)
Add: Now CodeBRT will support two new language localizations: Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese
Fix: Fix the Gemini response string may contain `\'` that will break the code when write to file
Fix: Fix the response feedback by function take incorrect role in Gemini
